mods.note: No. /7//~SY of 1366 Office of the Adviser to the Government, Bahrain Dated, 4th Shaaban, 1366 June 22, 1947. H. B. M f s Political Agent, Bahrain. Memorandum; - I enclose herewith a Power of Attorney from the Superintendent, Minors' Estates Department, Bahrain, in favour of Shaikh Hasson al^Taha of Baghdad, Iraq,, and should be grateful if you would register or attest it and return. I enclose here with the fee of Ko. 2 / 8 /-.Political Agency, Bahrain. Dated, 26th June, 1947. The Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, Bahrain. Memorandum . Reference your memorandum No.1711-24 dated the 22nd June, 1947. The certificate is written in Arabic. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File No. E/23 Attestation of Documents. a Powers of Attorney.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Folio 6 consists of file notes.

The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a memorandum and a letter sent to the Political Agency, Bahrain, requesting an attestation of a document for the Minors’ Estates Department, Bahrain, and a landing certificate for the Customs House, Qatar.The main correspondence is between the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), Yusuf Abdulrahman Fakhroo, and the Bahrain Political Agency.

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
